column4: guys help why i cant connect to  any webpage , only can connect with ip address , for example- typing www.google.com canno't connect , when i type http://74.125.224.72/ i can connect
put the line "nameserver x.x.x.x" where name server is the ip address of your dns server
I asked you to tell me what was in the file /etc/resolv.conf and you said "nothing" so - you must know where it is
when I asked you to see what was in that file and you told me "nothing" what did you do to check the file as I asked
you are currently using Microsoft Windows yes/no ?
ok - this channel is not for you
this channel support Ubuntu Linux Operating System
you are in that channel and you are asking for help - get help there
